title: Zhong Nong Jian Kang Jia Yuan
description: 中农有机生态素食馆 serves gourmet vegetarian cuisine (English name is Sino-Agriculture). Has a lunch time buffet from 11:30am-1pm, or upgrade to buffet pulus hotpot for additional charge. Located on the second floor of Xingjie Building which is on the corner of the intersection with Longjing St, at 五华区五一路156号兴杰大厦2楼. Entrance is behind the building where you take the stairs to the second floor (elevators does not take you there).
streetAddress: 2F Xingjie Mansion, 156 Wuyi Rd, Wuhua District
